item.title: How the new protein and dairy diet flies in the face of modern guidelines, according to a nutritionist who served on the advisory board until 2024
item.description: The main differences relate to recommendations about protein and dairy products.

item.title: Most police forces banned shooting at moving vehicles decades ago, and Biden asked ICE to do it in 2022. So why isn’t it policy?
item.description: Decades ago, the NYPD prohibited officers from shooting at moving vehicles. It led to a drop in police killings without more danger

item.title: White House says it’s ‘reviewing protocols’ after Trump seemingly violated federal policy by disclosing jobs data early
item.description: The White House claims "there was an inadvertent public disclosure" but it says the media shouldn't be "grasping at straws to foment another fake cont...

item.title: Silicon Valley billionaire flies coach out of solidarity: ‘If I’m going to ask my employees to do it, I need to do it, too’
item.description: "Even like, yes, I have a lot of money but ... it feels like I'm out of touch," said Palmer Luckey, who set a $100k limit on his startup's salaries.

item.title: The child prodigy who beats you at chess when you’re a kid is going to fade away in adulthood 90% of the time, study says
item.description: "Across the highest adult performance levels, peak performance is negatively correlated with early performance."
